20110121000932.000|20110121000932.000|CC1|        MADE WITH 10 GRAMS      
20110121000932.000|20110121000935.000|CC1|     OF POPPED WHOLE GRAINS.    
20110121000935.000|20110121000935.000|CC1|           EATING WELL          
20110121000935.000|20110121000938.000|CC1|   HAS NEVER BEEN SO TEMPTING.  
20110121000938.000|20110121000939.000|CC1|     DEPRESSION IS A SERIOUS    
20110121000939.000|20110121000941.000|CC1|       MEDICAL CONDITION.       
20110121000941.000|20110121000941.000|CC1|      I FEEL LIKE I HAVE TO     
20110121000941.000|20110121000943.000|CC1|         WIND MYSELF UP         
20110121000943.000|20110121000943.000|CC1|    TO DEAL WITH THE SADNESS,   
20110121000943.000|20110121000946.000|CC1|      THE LOSS OF INTEREST,     
20110121000946.000|20110121000947.000|CC1|       THE LACK OF ENERGY.      
20110121000947.000|20110121000947.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] ASK YOUR  
20110121000947.000|20110121000949.000|CC1|     DOCTOR ABOUT PRISTIQ --    
20110121000949.000|20110121000949.000|CC1|     A PRESCRIPTION MEDICINE    
20110121000949.000|20110121000951.000|CC1|   PROVEN TO TREAT DEPRESSION.  
20110121000951.000|20110121000953.000|CC1|    PRISTIQ IS THOUGHT TO WORK  
20110121000953.000|20110121000953.000|CC1|    BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS OF  
20110121000953.000|20110121000955.000|CC1|  TWO CHEMICALS IN THE BRAIN -- 
20110121000955.000|20110121000956.000|CC1|  SEROTONIN AND NOREPINEPHRINE. 
20110121000956.000|20110121000956.000|CC1|   TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY  
20110121000956.000|20110121000959.000|CC1|   IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS   
20110121000959.000|20110121000959.000|CC1|   OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES  
20110121000959.000|20110121001001.000|CC1|        IN MOOD, BEHAVIOR,      
20110121001001.000|20110121001003.000|CC1|     OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.    
20110121001003.000|20110121001003.000|CC1|  ANTI-DEPRESSANTS CAN INCREASE 
20110121001003.000|20110121001005.000|CC1|        SUICIDAL THOUGHTS       
20110121001005.000|20110121001005.000|CC1|    AND BEHAVIORS IN CHILDREN,  
20110121001005.000|20110121001007.000|CC1|     TEENS, AND YOUNG ADULTS.   
20110121001007.000|20110121001007.000|CC1|     PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED    
20110121001007.000|20110121001010.000|CC1|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.     
20110121001010.000|20110121001012.000|CC1| DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20110121001012.000|20110121001012.000|CC1|          TAKING PRISTIQ        
20110121001012.000|20110121001014.000|CC1|    WITH NSET PAIN RELIEVERS,   
20110121001014.000|20110121001014.000|CC1|   ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS   
20110121001014.000|20110121001017.000|CC1|   MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.  
20110121001017.000|20110121001017.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20110121001017.000|20110121001019.000|CC1|   ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,  
20110121001019.000|20110121001021.000|CC1|  INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE, 
20110121001021.000|20110121001021.000|CC1|      TO AVOID A POTENTIALLY    
20110121001021.000|20110121001023.000|CC1|   LIFE THREATENING CONDITION.  
20110121001023.000|20110121001023.000|CC1|   PRISTIQ MAY CAUSE OR WORSEN  
20110121001023.000|20110121001025.000|CC1|       HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE,     
20110121001025.000|20110121001027.000|CC1|  HIGH CHOLESTEROL, OR GLAUCOMA.
20110121001027.000|20110121001027.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20110121001027.000|20110121001029.000|CC1|    IF YOU HAVE HEART DISEASE,  
20110121001029.000|20110121001029.000|CC1|       OR BEFORE YOU REDUCE     
20110121001029.000|20110121001031.000|CC1|     OR STOP TAKING PRISTIQ.
